Great knowledge on how you can turn your website visitors into customers. From the first few lectures, you’ll really notice that the teacher know first-hand what works and what doesn’t. They were able to give expert advice through a step-by-step layout from understanding your visitor’s personas up to testing. At first, I thought this would be too technical for me, but I was able to grasp this easily and I’m now implementing the strategies and techniques from this video lessons. Highly recommended!

This course is absolutely terrible. Unbelievably simplistic and gives no benefit whatsoever to anyone who knows more than absolutely nothing. If you want to waste your money and get completely ripper off, this is the course for you.

In addition, if you then try to contact Fiverr for your money back, under the 30 day money back guarantee, they will say no and they will not refund your money. DO NOT WASTE YOUR TIME!

Thanks for sharing such great information with us through this course. Recommended!!!
It's a good introductory course, but I found it a bit too vague on some important subjects. Item 24 and item 25 are purely a repeat from each other.

In this course you will learn what CRO is, but you will not learn how to increase it.
She didn't even mention anything about doing market research and writing persuasive and strategic copy and also she mentioned nothing about the offer creation and how to build a offer that makes people feel stupid saying no, these two alone are 80% of the CRO work. She talked about the other 20% like design, adding urgency, split testing buttons, blah blah.. 
Don't waste your time. This is my first 1-star review on Fiverr after I rated almost 60 freelancers

Good course overall with basic knowledge of CRO. For me, it was a little bit too basic and the main information inside this course is mainly for people with a very minimal understanding of what conversion rate is or how they should implement optimizations. I did get some new insights like new software tools to use I didn't know about like Optimizely. If you already have a good understanding of conversion rate optimization I personally wouldn't recommend this course. If you have little experience with CRO and are just learning the course I think this course does a great job of teaching all of the basics in a clear and easy-to-understand manner.
